input_text: 北京故宫是中国明清两代的皇家宫殿，旧称为紫禁城，是中国古代宫廷建筑的精华。北京故宫以三大殿为中心，占地面积72万平方米，建筑面积约15万平方米，有大小宫殿七十多座，房屋九千余间。是世界上现存规模最大、保存最为完整的木质结构古建筑之一。
reference_translation: The Forbidden City in Beijing is the imperial palace of the Ming and Qing dynasties in China, formerly known as the Forbidden City. It is the essence of ancient Chinese palace architecture. The Forbidden City centers on the three main halls, covering an area of 720,000 square meters with a building area of approximately 150,000 square meters. It has more than 70 palaces of various sizes and over 9,000 rooms. It is one of the largest and best-preserved wooden structures in the world.
qwen3:latest_translation: The Forbidden City in Beijing was the imperial palace of the Ming and Qing dynasties, formerly known as the Purple Forbidden City, and represents the pinnacle of ancient Chinese palace architecture. Centered around the Three Grand Palaces, it spans 720,000 square meters in total area with approximately 150,000 square meters of built-up space, featuring over 70 palaces and more than 9,000 rooms. It is one of the largest and best-preserved wooden-structured ancient buildings in the world.
gpt-oss:latest_translation: The Forbidden City in Beijing was the imperial palace of China during the Ming and Qing dynasties, formerly called the Purple Forbidden City, and it is considered the essence of ancient Chinese court architecture. Centered around its three main halls, the Forbidden City covers an area of 720,000 square meters and has a built‑up area of about 150,000 square meters. It contains more than seventy palaces of various sizes and over nine thousand rooms. It is one of the world's largest and best‑preserved wooden‑structure ancient buildings still standing.
gemma3:latest_translation: The Forbidden City in Beijing is the imperial palace of the Ming and Qing dynasties. Formerly known as Zhaidi Cheng, it is the epitome of ancient Chinese palace architecture. The Forbidden City is centered around the Three Great Halls, covering an area of 720,000 square meters with a building area of approximately 150,000 square meters, featuring over seventy palaces and more than nine thousand rooms. It is one of the largest and best-preserved wooden structure ancient buildings in the world.
deepseek-r1:8b_translation: The Forbidden City in Beijing served as the imperial palace for China during the Ming and Qing dynasties, commonly known by its former name, the Purple Forbidden City. It epitomizes the pinnacle of ancient Chinese palace architecture. At its core lies the Three Great Halls, with the complex spanning 720,000 square meters, encompassing approximately 150,000 square meters of built structures. Within this expansive site, there are over 70 palaces and more than 9,000 rooms. It stands as one of the largest and best-preserved timber structures among ancient wooden architecture complexes globally.

input_text: 人工智能技术的发展正在深刻改变着我们的生活方式。从智能手机的语音助手到自动驾驶汽车，人工智能已经渗透到日常生活的方方面面。机器学习算法能够分析海量数据，识别模式，并做出预测，这为医疗诊断、金融分析和个性化推荐等领域带来了革命性的变化。
reference_translation: The development of artificial intelligence technology is profoundly changing our way of life. From voice assistants on smartphones to self-driving cars, AI has penetrated every aspect of daily life. Machine learning algorithms can analyze massive amounts of data, identify patterns, and make predictions, bringing revolutionary changes to fields such as medical diagnosis, financial analysis, and personalized recommendations.
qwen3:latest_translation: The development of artificial intelligence technology is profoundly transforming our daily lives. From voice assistants in smartphones to self-driving cars, artificial intelligence has been integrated into every aspect of everyday life. Machine learning algorithms can analyze vast quantities of data, identify patterns, and make predictions, driving transformative changes in fields such as medical diagnosis, financial analysis, and personalized recommendations.
gpt-oss:latest_translation: The development of artificial‑intelligence technology is profoundly transforming our way of life. From voice assistants on smartphones to self‑driving cars, AI has already seeped into every corner of everyday life. Machine‑learning algorithms can sift through massive amounts of data, spot patterns, and predict outcomes—bringing revolutionary changes to fields such as medical diagnostics, financial analysis, and personalized recommendations.
gemma3:latest_translation: The development of artificial intelligence technology is profoundly changing our lifestyles. From smartphone voice assistants to self-driving cars, artificial intelligence has permeated all aspects of daily life. Machine learning algorithms can analyze massive amounts of data, identify patterns, and make predictions, which has brought about revolutionary changes in fields such as medical diagnosis, financial analysis, and personalized recommendations.
deepseek-r1:8b_translation: The development of artificial intelligence technology is profoundly transforming our lifestyles. From voice assistants on smartphones to self-driving cars, AI has seamlessly integrated into every facet of daily life. Machine learning algorithms can analyze massive datasets, identify patterns, and generate predictions, leading to revolutionary changes in areas like medical diagnosis, financial analysis, and personalized recommendations.

input_text: 环境保护是当今世界面临的重大挑战之一。气候变化、空气污染和生物多样性丧失威胁着人类的未来。各国政府和国际组织正在采取措施，推动可持续发展，包括发展清洁能源、减少温室气体排放和保护自然栖息地。
reference_translation: Environmental protection is one of the major challenges facing the world today. Climate change, air pollution, and biodiversity loss threaten humanity's future. Governments and international organizations are taking measures to promote sustainable development, including developing clean energy, reducing greenhouse gas emissions, and protecting natural habitats.
qwen3:latest_translation: Environmental protection is one of the major challenges facing the world today. Climate change, air pollution, and the loss of biodiversity threaten humanity's future. Governments around the world and international organizations are taking measures to promote sustainable development, including developing clean energy, reducing greenhouse gas emissions, and protecting natural habitats.
gpt-oss:latest_translation: Environmental protection is one of the major challenges facing the world today. Climate change, air pollution, and biodiversity loss threaten humanity's future. Governments and international organizations are taking measures to promote sustainable development, including the development of clean energy, the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions, and the protection of natural habitats.
gemma3:latest_translation: 环境保护是当今世界面临的重大挑战之一。气候变化、空气污染和生物多样性丧失威胁着人类的未来。各国政府和国际组织正在采取措施，推动可持续发展，包括发展清洁能源、减少温室气体排放和保护自然栖息地。
deepseek-r1:8b_translation: Environmental protection is one of the major challenges facing the world today. Climate change, air pollution, and the loss of biological diversity threaten the future of humanity. Governments and international organizations are taking measures to promote sustainable development, including developing clean energy, reducing greenhouse gas emissions, and preserving natural habitats.

input_text: 儒家思想强调仁爱、礼仪和道德修养，对中国文化产生了深远的影响。孔子提倡"己所不欲，勿施于人"的道德原则，主张通过教育和自我完善来实现社会和谐。这种以人为本的哲学理念至今仍然影响着东亚社会的价值观和行为准则。
reference_translation: Confucian thought emphasizes benevolence, propriety, and moral cultivation, and has had a profound impact on Chinese culture. Confucius advocated the moral principle of 'do not do to others what you do not want done to yourself,' and advocated achieving social harmony through education and self-improvement. This people-centered philosophical concept still influences the values and behavioral norms of East Asian societies today.
qwen3:latest_translation: Confucian thought emphasizes benevolence, rituals, and moral cultivation, which has had a profound impact on Chinese culture. Confucius advocated the moral principle of 'Do not impose on others what you yourself do not desire,' promoting social harmony through education and self-cultivation. This people-centered philosophical concept continues to influence the values and behavioral norms of East Asian societies to this day.
gpt-oss:latest_translation: Confucian thought emphasizes benevolence, propriety, and moral cultivation, profoundly shaping Chinese culture. Confucius promoted the moral principle of "Treat others as you would not wish to be treated" and advocated achieving social harmony through education and self‑improvement. This human‑centered philosophy continues to influence the values and behavioral norms of East Asian societies to this day.
gemma3:latest_translation: 儒家思想强调仁爱、礼仪和道德修养，对中国文化产生了深远的影响。孔子提倡"己所不欲，勿施于人"的道德原则，主张通过教育和自我完善来实现社会和谐。这种以人为本的哲学理念至今仍然影响着东亚社会的价值观和行为准则。
deepseek-r1:8b_translation: Confucian thought emphasizes benevolence, etiquette, and moral cultivation, having a profound influence on Chinese culture. Confucius advocated the moral principle of 'Do not do to others as you would not have them do to you,' and promoted achieving social harmony through education and self-improvement. This people-centric philosophy continues to influence the values and behavioral norms of East Asian societies.

input_text: 现代城市生活节奏快、压力大，许多年轻人面临着工作和生活平衡的挑战。共享经济、外卖服务和移动支付等新兴科技改变了人们的消费习惯和生活方式。同时，城市规划者也在努力创造更宜居的环境，增加绿地空间，改善公共交通系统。
reference_translation: Modern urban life is fast-paced and stressful, and many young people face challenges in balancing work and life. Emerging technologies such as the sharing economy, food delivery services, and mobile payments have changed people's consumption habits and lifestyles. At the same time, urban planners are working hard to create more livable environments, increase green spaces, and improve public transportation systems.
qwen3:latest_translation: Modern urban life is fast-paced and stressful, with many young people struggling to balance work and personal life. Emerging technologies such as the sharing economy, food delivery services, and mobile payments have transformed consumption habits and lifestyles. Meanwhile, urban planners are working to enhance livability by expanding green spaces and upgrading public transportation systems.
gpt-oss:latest_translation: Modern urban life moves at a fast pace and carries high levels of stress, and many young people are confronted with the challenge of balancing work and life. The sharing economy, food delivery services, mobile payments, and other emerging technologies have altered people's consumption habits and lifestyles. At the same time, urban planners are working to create more livable environments, expand green spaces, and improve public transportation systems.

deepseek-r1:8b_translation: Urban life is fast-paced and stressful, with many young people facing challenges in balancing work and personal life. Emerging technologies such as the sharing economy, food delivery services, and mobile payments have transformed people's consumption habits and lifestyles. Meanwhile, urban planners are striving to create more livable environments by increasing green spaces and improving public transportation systems.
